Product Description

Crafted from water resistant fabric, these PureFit outdoor curtain panels ensure your outdoor living spaces and furniture are free keep dry on rainy and snowy days. Their lightweight and breathable nature allows for quick dry properties.

Our weather resistant curtains are made to last! Finished with excellent stitching and strong hems, these panels are tear resistant and can support additional weight to them without tearing up.

These outdoor curtains are constructed with silver rust-proof grommets with inner diameter of 1.6” making them extremely easy to install and moving the curtain along the rod.

Our outdoor panels provide the right amount of privacy without sacrificing comfort. They breathable to keep you cooler and more comfortable in hot weather.

Pattern
Solid Solid Line Moroccan Leaf

Material
100% polyester 100% polyester 100% polyester 100% polyester 100% polyester

Package
1 panel 2 panels 2 panels 2 panels 2 panels

Color Options
8 8 6 6 6

PACKAGE CONTENT & PRODUCT DIMENSIONS: Our weatherproof outdoor curtains are sold in panel (1 panel in each package). Each curtain panel measures 52” width by 84” Length, a set of 2 curtain panels measures 104” width by 84” Length. The curtains are constructed with silver rust-proof grommets with inner diameter of 1.6”
DURABLE, BREATHABLE & PRIVACY COMFORT FABRIC: PureFit outdoor curtains are crafted from a premium, weather resistant textured fabric (100% polyester composition). Our outdoor curtains provide the perfect amount of privacy and are breathable allowing air to pass through them, creating a comfortable space
UV and FADE RESISTANT OUTDOOR CURTAINS: Our outdoor curtains block harmful UV rays from the sun and filters the amount of sunlight getting into your space creating a soft ambiance. Our fade resistant fabrics’ performance is an integral part of the fabric, not an applied finish that would wash off over time
WATERPROOF CUTAINS PERFECT FOR EVERY OUTDOOR SPACES: These waterproof panels will ensure your outdoor spaces and furniture stay free from rain or snow. They are perfect for both indoor and outdoor spaces such as bedroom, living room, patio, front porch, cabana, gazebo, and more. (For best wind resistance performances add weights at the bottom)
SIMPLE FABRIC CARE: Simply clean these outdoor curtains in a washing machine with cold water, tumble dry on low, iron at low temperature if need. Because the color goes to the core of the fiber, the fabrics will not lose their color

These outdoor curtains are constructed with silver rust-proof grommets with inner diameter of 1.6” making them extremely easy to install and moving the curtain along the rod.

Our outdoor panels provide the right amount of privacy without sacrificing comfort. They breathable to keep you cooler and more comfortable in hot weather.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $39.99 - $29.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:51:55 UTC – Details)



【2022 70W Thermostatically Controlled Birdbath Water Heated】AC 120V 70W the outdoor bird bath de-icer thermostatically controlled to operate when necessarily, will automatically turn off at 118 °F and restart work at 68 °F. Heated bird bath prevents water from freezing due to 0-degree F or colder weather. Attract more birds to your yard in winter！
【Heavy Duty Material & Automatic Start-stop Design】Bird bath heater aluminum base surface and full coverage aluminum liners, with highly heat conductive and durable for maximum usage to prevent rust. Built-in an additional thermostat sensor which working continuously in the circuit. When the heating base temperature exceeds 118°F (48°C) will Automatic Disconnect and the temperature drops to 68°F (20°C), the heating will automatically start to ensure safety. Provide better care for your birds.
【Waterproof Design & Safe for Bird】Built-in full-coverage partition layer and high-density aluminum shell double protection can better protect the heating wire, heavy-duty Pond De-icer can waterproof and rust to ensure the safety of birds. Built-in heating cord allows birds and squirrels won’t get hurt if they peck at the electric cord keeps curious birds safe. Allows birds to play in warm water in winter.
【Plug and Play】The birdbath heater has no spare parts to replace, simply plug into a power source and your birds or farm animals will enjoy the gentle warmth water within minutes; In order to prolong the service life of the product, please make sure the heated chicken water Deicer is full cover by water.
【Widely Application】This bird bath heaters can provide fresh flowing warm water for birds and small animals outdoors in winter. Attract more birds to your yard to drink and bathe, It will make you happy to look out during a beautiful snow storm and see a bird getting a drink or a moment of rest from the weather.

[More Efficient & Safer Light Sensors]-We use a more advanced monocrystalline solar panel and have upgraded its size. It can now receive, store and release solar energy more efficiently, dramatically increasing the solar energy conversion rate, meaning shorter charging times and longer lighting times. All modules are IP65 waterproof, whether it is raining, foggy or snowing can be used outdoors. Usually it can work up to 10-12 hours after 4-6 hours of charging in direct sunlight.
[Variable Lighting Modes to Create Various Ambiance]-The solar starlight light has 8 different lighting modes that can be adjusted by the ‘mode’ button behind the solar panel. And the built-in memory chip with memory function, every time you turn it on or when the night comes, it will automatically adopt the mode set for you last time. You can adjust to the most suitable lighting mode according to the need for decoration or different situations.
[Extra-Long & Widely Used Outdoor/Indoor String Lights]-The solar LED string lights are 66FT long, the spacing of LED beads is 10cm, and the lead length is 6FT, which can be easily installed in the place where decoration is needed. It can be molded into various shapes for gardens, courtyards, trees, porches, roofs, fences bistros, restaurants, hotels, commercial buildings. It can also be used in weddings, parties, Christmas, New Year parties to create a warm, joyful and festive ambiance.
[Be The Most Responsible Seller]-We are committed to provide you with high quality products. If you encounter any problem in the process of using solar string lights, please feel free to contact us, we will provide 7*24 hours technical service, you just need to send an email to the buyer center, we will reply within 8 hours.NOTE: It will automatically charge and light up at night when the switch behind the solar panel is turned on.

【Remote Control & 4 Lighting Modes】The solar outdoor lights is equipped with a wireless remote control, allowing you to select the most appropriate mode more conveniently. 【Easy to install, long working time】Easy to install without annoying wires or adapters, Only using the included screws to fix on any exterior wall constructed of all types.The built-in 1800mAh high-efficiency solar cell, so please install these lights in the sun to charge the battery.
